chunk-f1aa38e03a2cdd3122f479f8a521b9a0.description: Beto O'Rourke, also known as Mr. O'Rourke, is a former congressman and the Democratic challenger in the race for governor against the incumbent Greg Abbott. He has raised $27.6 million in the last filing, outpacing Mr. Abbott.

Greg Abbott, also known as Mr. Abbott, is the current governor of Texas and a two-term incumbent. He is competing against Beto O'Rourke in the race for governor and has raised $24.9 million in the last filing.
